DOC.brief_summary: This study involve place donor bone back low jaw cover newly design titanium mesh . The mesh stay mouth 4 month remove . Implants place newly form bone . The goal study test well use newly design titanium mesh bone particle grow bone back low jaw . The investigator also check newly form bone stay around implant use 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: A Feasibility Study Growth Bone Vertically With Titanium Mesh Allograft Lower Posterior Jaw
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion Criteria - Patients least 18 year old - At least two adjacent back teeth low jaw miss - No medical contraindication dental surgery - Inadequate vertical ridge height edentulous region ( le 10mm ) Exclusion Criteria - Unstable systemic disease condition would compromise heal potential - Patients osseous metabolic disorder ( e.g. , osteoporosis , Paget 's disease etc . ) - Patients pregnant expect get pregnant - Patients unstable dental disease ( e.g . caries periodontitis ) surgical sextant
DOC.criteria: Systemically healthy patient ( ASA I II ) Nonsmoker light smoker ( < 10 cigarette per day ) Good oral health ( FMPS FMBS < 20 % ) At least two adjacent mandibular posterior teeth miss Inadequate vertical ridge height edentulous region ( le 10mm ) Missing teeth ≥ 3 month Unstable complicate systemic disease chronic disorder preclude surgical procedure Systemic disease compromise heal potential ( Uncontrolled Diabetes Mellitus , HIV infection , etc . ) Bone disorder ( Hyperparathyroidism , Osteoporosis , Paget 's Disease ) Pregnant expect become pregnant Currently smoking ( ≥ 10 cigarettes/day ) Poor oral hygiene ( ≥20 % Modified O'Leary Plaque Index ) Severe grinding , clench , TMJ disorder Untreated dental disease ( periodontitis , caries , abscess ) research quadrant Teeth exhibit periapical pathology purulence ( symptomatic ) research quadrant
